accessory.title: MultiSwitcheroo
accessory.description: The type of acccessory must be MultiSwitcheroo.

name.title: Main Switch Name
name.description: The name of the main multi-switch device for HomeKit.

disabled.title: Disable Accessory?
disabled.description: Set to true to disable this accessory.

firmwareRevision.title: Firmware Revision
firmwareRevision.description: Firmware version displayed in HomeKit. HomeKit expects Semantic Versioning, ie. `1.0.0` or `23.24.16-beta`, & does not display the pre-release or build metadata, ie. will show 23.24.16

statusUrl.title: Status URL
statusUrl.description: URL to call for status response.

statusRequestType.title: Status Request Type
statusRequestType.description: Must be either GET, PUT, POST or DELETE (default is GET if NONE specified).

statusRequestHeaders.title: Status Request Headers
statusRequestHeaders.description: Headers go be used for status requests.

Authorization.title: Authorization Header
Authorization.description: Bearer token or other authorization header.

Content-Type.title: Content-Type Header
Content-Type.description: Content type header of the request.

statusRequestBody.title: Body of status request when using PUT or POST
statusRequestBody.description: Body to be sent in PUT & POST status requests (ensure proper formatting).

switches.title: Included Switches
switches.description: Array of switches to be exposed under one MultiSwitcheroo.

onUrl.title: On URL
onUrl.description: URL to call using when turned On.

onRequestType.title: On request type
onRequestType.description: Must be either GET, PUT, POST or DELETE (default is GET if NONE specified).

onRequestHeaders.title: On request headers
onRequestHeaders.description: Headers to use when turned On.

Authorization.title: Authorization Header
Authorization.description: Bearer token or other authorization header.

onRequestBody.title: Body of On request when using PUT or POST.
onRequestBody.description: Body to be sent in PUT & POST On requests (ensure proper formatting).

offUrl.title: Off URL
offUrl.description: URL to call using GET request when turned Off.

offRequestType.title: Off request type
offRequestType.description: Must be either GET, PUT, POST or DELETE (default is GET if NONE specified).

offRequestHeaders.title: Off request headers
offRequestHeaders.description: Headers to use when turned Off.

Authorization.title: Authorization Header
Authorization.description: Bearer token or other authorization header.

offRequestBody.title: Body of Off request when using PUT or POST
offRequestBody.description: Body to be sent in PUT & POST Off requests (ensure proper formatting).

statusPattern.title: Status Pattern
statusPattern.description: regex string to parse from statusURL response to get status.
